description: Lists devices allocated to the stage, containing detailed device information and deployment status.

parameters.name: EdgeDeploymentPlanName
parameters.description: The name of the edge deployment plan.

parameters.name: StageName
parameters.description: The name of the stage in the deployment.

nested_items.name: DeviceDeploymentSummaries
nested_items.description: List of summaries of devices allocated to the stage.

nested_items.name: EdgeDeploymentPlanArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the edge deployment plan.

nested_items.name: EdgeDeploymentPlanName
nested_items.description: The name of the edge deployment plan.

nested_items.name: StageName
nested_items.description: The name of the stage in the edge deployment plan.

nested_items.name: DeployedStageName
nested_items.description: The name of the deployed stage.

nested_items.name: DeviceFleetName
nested_items.description: The name of the fleet to which the device belongs to.

nested_items.name: DeviceDeploymentStatus
nested_items.description: The deployment status of the device.

nested_items.name: DeviceDeploymentStatusMessage
nested_items.description: The detailed error message for the deployoment status result.

nested_items.name: DeploymentStartTime
nested_items.description: The time when the deployment on the device started.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The token to use when calling the next page of results.
